meanings.definition: A group or association of craftsmen or merchants
meanings.sent1: The guildships in the town worked together to create beautiful crafts.
meanings.sent2: Many guildships gathered at the market to sell their goods.
meanings.sent3: The guildships decided to host a friendly competition to showcase their skills.
meanings.sent4: The guildships sailed through the market, their wares shining in the sun.
meanings.sent5: Joining the guildships meant becoming part of a close-knit community of artisans.

meanings.definition: The act of forming or joining a guildship
meanings.sent1: Her guildship into the group was celebrated with a special ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The guildship of new members brought fresh ideas to the association.
meanings.sent3: He performed a dance to commemorate his guildship into the guild.
meanings.sent4: The guildship of the team was a pivotal moment in their success.
meanings.sent5: Joining the guildship required dedication and commitment to the craft.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being a member of a guildship
meanings.sent1: The pride of guildship shone in their eyes as they displayed their work.
meanings.sent2: She carried herself with the grace and confidence of guildship.
meanings.sent3: His sense of humor was a delightful addition to the guildship.
meanings.sent4: The bond of guildship among them was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: Being part of the guildship meant upholding the values of craftsmanship and camaraderie.
